entry.title: Forcing Utility On The SEC
entry.summary: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission under Chair Gensler is a rigid challenger of the crypto industry in its aggressive application of an age-old regime to digital assets. Even without the 97 enforcement actions and billions in imposed penalties, the SEC has effectively impaired the industry from advancing digital innovation and technology by stalling approval … Forcing Utility On The SEC Read More »

entry.title: Why Compound Might Ditch its Yield Farmers
entry.summary: A new proposal seeks to drastically overhaul $COMP incentives.

entry.title: Ethereum Foundation, AMD, Polkadot Launch $7M Competition to Boost Zero-Knowledge Scaling
entry.summary: Leading crypto projects have banded together to offer $7M in prizes to teams innovating using zero-knowledge (ZK) proofs.

entry.title: Ethereum Mixer Blocks North Korean Hacker Group Behind $600M Axie Infinity Heist Tornado Cash’s advocacy of financial freedom does not extend to enemies of the United States.
entry.summary: Tornado Cash is blacklisting sanctioned addresses from its website in conjunction with Chainalysis.

entry.title: Uniswap Launches Swap Widget For Third-Party Apps
entry.summary: Uniswap's new widget allows developers to integrate token swaps with a single line of code.
